com.ac.games.db

Interface GamesDatabase


  • public interface GamesDatabase
    This interface needs to account for all database CRUD operations that can be performed. Additional tasks may be added to here or to an additional interface, but all basic objects from the pojos library should be implemented via method calls in this interface, rather than stacking a bunch of interfaces together.
    Author:
    ac010168

    • Method Detail

      • initializeDBConnection

        void initializeDBConnection()
                            throws ConfigurationException
        This method should specifically open the connection to the provided database implementation.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this Exception if there are configuration problems that prevent the database connection from being established.

      • closeDBConnection

        void closeDBConnection()
                       throws ConfigurationException
        This method should specifically close the open connection to the provided database implementation. This method should not throw an error if the database connection has not been opened.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this Exception if there were problems closing down the open database connection.

      • readBGGGameData

        com.ac.games.data.BGGGame readBGGGameData(long bggID)
                                          throws ConfigurationException,
                                                 DatabaseOperationException
        This method should query the database for the requested BGGGame by bggID.
        Parameters:
        bggID - The bggID from BoardGameGeek for this game.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • insertBGGGameData

        void insertBGGGameData(com.ac.games.data.BGGGame game)
                       throws ConfigurationException,
                              DatabaseOperationException
        This method should insert the new BGGGame data into the database. If the object already exists, this method should throw a DatabaseOperationException.
        Parameters:
        game - The BGGGame object to be written to the database.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • updateBGGGameData

        void updateBGGGameData(com.ac.games.data.BGGGame game)
                       throws ConfigurationException,
                              DatabaseOperationException
        This method should update the existing BGGGame data into the database. If the object does not exist (or no rows were updated), this method may throw a DatabaseOperationException.
        Parameters:
        game - The BGGGame object to be written to the database.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • deleteBGGGameData

        void deleteBGGGameData(long bggID)
                       throws ConfigurationException,
                              DatabaseOperationException
        This method should delete the requested BGGGame data from the database. If the object does not exist (or no rows were deleted), this method may throw a DatabaseOperationException.
        Parameters:
        bggID - The bggID from BoardGameGeek for this game.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

        com.ac.games.data.Game readGame(long gameID)
                                throws ConfigurationException,
                                       DatabaseOperationException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A Game object, nor null if not found

      • readGameByName

        List<com.ac.games.data.Game> readGameByName(String gameName,
                                          boolean addWildCard,
                                          com.ac.games.data.GameType gameTypeFilter)
                                            throws ConfigurationException,
                                                   DatabaseOperationException
        Query to read Game content from the database
        Parameters:
        gameName - The name of the game we want to search for
        addWildCard - Flag to determine if we want to add wild card searching to our search name
        gameTypeFilter - Filter by game type, such as BASE or EXPANSION only. Default is BASE_AND_COLLECTIBLE
        Returns:
        a List of Game entries matching this name pattern
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • readGameFromAutoName

        com.ac.games.data.CompactSearchData readGameFromAutoName(String gameName,
                                                       String primaryPublisher,
                                                       int yearPublished)
                                                         throws ConfigurationException,
                                                                DatabaseOperationException
        Query to read Game content from the database
        Parameters:
        gameName - The name of the game we want to search for
        primaryPublisher - The name of the primary publisher, if available
        yearPublished - The year this game was published.
        Returns:
        a List of Game entries matching this name pattern
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • updateGameReltn

        void updateGameReltn(com.ac.games.data.GameReltn gameReltn)
                     throws ConfigurationException,
                            DatabaseOperationException
        This method should update the new Game data into the database. If the object does not exist, this method can throw a DatabaseOperationException. Probably the most common interaction with this object aside from queries.
        Parameters:
        gameReltn - The GameReltn object to be written to the database.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • deleteGameReltn

        void deleteGameReltn(long reltnID)
                     throws ConfigurationException,
                            DatabaseOperationException
        This method will probably never be used. It is valid for implementations to not support this operation. Adding for CRUD completionism. It's a syndrome.
        Parameters:
        reltnID - The reltnID for this GameReltn in the database.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

        List<Long> getBggIDList()
                        throws ConfigurationException,
                               DatabaseOperationException
        Custom Query to get the list of all BoardGameGeek bggIDs currently in our index.
        Returns:
        A list of bggIDs, or an empty list if none exist.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution

        A list of mmIDs, or an empty list if none exist.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • readBGGGameByName

        List<com.ac.games.data.BGGGame> readBGGGameByName(String gameName,
                                                boolean addWildCard,
                                                com.ac.games.data.GameType gameTypeFilter)
                                                  throws ConfigurationException,
                                                         DatabaseOperationException
        Read BGGGame entry or entries by gameName.
        Parameters:
        gameName - The name we want to search for
        addWildCard - Flag to indicate whether we should wildcard the ending, to help with tasks like auto-complete.
        gameTypeFilter - A filter to limit the game types returned
        Returns:
        A List of Games (or an empty list if nothing was found). Do not return null.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • readBGGGameByName

        List<com.ac.games.data.CompactSearchData> readBGGGameByName(String gameName,
                                                          boolean addWildCard,
                                                          com.ac.games.data.GameType gameTypeFilter,
                                                          int resultLimit)
                                                            throws ConfigurationException,
                                                                   DatabaseOperationException
        Read compact BGGGame entry or entries by gameName.
        Parameters:
        gameName - The name we want to search for
        addWildCard - Flag to indicate whether we should wildcard the ending, to help with tasks like auto-complete.
        gameTypeFilter - A filter to limit the game types returned
        resultLimit - Limit the number of rows returned
        Returns:
        A List of Games (or an empty list if nothing was found). Do not return null.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • readBGGGameForReview

        com.ac.games.data.BGGGame readBGGGameForReview(String reviewType)
                                               throws ConfigurationException,
                                                      DatabaseOperationException
        Read BGGGame entry for items that need review. This will return a single item that requires review based on the priority assigned by the reviewType.
        Parameters:
        reviewType - The review type, typically either 'new' or 'old'
        Returns:
        A single item requiring reivew, or null if no items require review
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException
        DatabaseOperationException

                                                                 throws ConfigurationException,
                                                                        DatabaseOperationException

        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • readCSIDataByTitle

        List<com.ac.games.data.CompactSearchData> readCSIDataByTitle(String title,
                                                           boolean addWildCard,
                                                           int rowLimit)
                                                             throws ConfigurationException,
                                                                    DatabaseOperationException
        Read CoolStuffIncPriceData entry or entries by gameName.
        Parameters:
        title - The name we want to search for
        addWildCard - Flag to indicate whether we should wildcard the ending, to help with tasks like auto-complete.
        rowLimit - Limit the number of results returned, primarily for auto-complete.
        Returns:
        A List of Games (or an empty list if nothing was found). Do not return null.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - Throws this exception if the database connection is not active.
        DatabaseOperationException - Throws this exception if there are errors during the execution of the requested operation.

      • readCSIDataForReview

        com.ac.games.data.CoolStuffIncPriceData readCSIDataForReview(String reviewType)
                                                             throws ConfigurationException,
                                                                    DatabaseOperationException
        Read CoolStuffIncPriceData entry for items that need review. This will return a single item that requires review based on the priority assigned by the reviewType.
        Parameters:
        reviewType - The review type, typically either 'new' or 'old'
        Returns:
        A single item requiring reivew, or null if no items require review
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException
        DatabaseOperationException
